trans-unit.source: Service Bus Entity Metrics REST APIs
trans-unit.target: Service Bus Entity Metrics REST APIs

trans-unit.source: <token>sb2</token> collects usage telemetry for queues, topics, and subscriptions.
trans-unit.target: <token>sb2</token> collects usage telemetry for queues, topics, and subscriptions.

trans-unit.source: You can access this data either through the Azure management portal or by using the Service Bus RDFE APIs.
trans-unit.target: You can access this data either through the Azure management portal or by using the Service Bus RDFE APIs.

trans-unit.source: <token>sb2</token> collects data for messaging entities every 5 minutes.
trans-unit.target: <token>sb2</token> collects data for messaging entities every 5 minutes.

trans-unit.source: However, you can retrieve your metrics data within hourly and daily precision time windows.
trans-unit.target: However, you can retrieve your metrics data within hourly and daily precision time windows.

trans-unit.source: Using the Service Bus entity metrics REST APIs
trans-unit.target: Using the Service Bus entity metrics REST APIs

trans-unit.source: Before using the <token>sb2</token> entity metrics REST APIs, you must obtain a management certificate and upload this certificate to your Azure subscription.
trans-unit.target: Before using the <token>sb2</token> entity metrics REST APIs, you must obtain a management certificate and upload this certificate to your Azure subscription.

trans-unit.source: <token>crdefault</token> <externalLink><linkText>Create and Upload a Management Certificate for Azure</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/gg551722.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: <token>crdefault</token> <externalLink><linkText>Create and Upload a Management Certificate for Azure</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/gg551722.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: The <token>sb2</token> entity metrics APIs enable you to discover the data points supported for each messaging entity, and their rollup policy (aggregation as well as data retention), before you make a call to return the actual data.
trans-unit.target: The <token>sb2</token> entity metrics APIs enable you to discover the data points supported for each messaging entity, and their rollup policy (aggregation as well as data retention), before you make a call to return the actual data.

trans-unit.source: While each call returns a single data point in a given time precision, you can use batching to bundle multiple queries into a single REST call.
trans-unit.target: While each call returns a single data point in a given time precision, you can use batching to bundle multiple queries into a single REST call.
